title: 2nd round councelling
content: Will the 2nd round be postponed again? I regret that I did not attend the 1st round. I am waiting for 2nd round since starting of August . I am tired doing that I got 5xx rank in pessat and thinking that I could get cse rr campus in 2nd round but I can not wait if they postpone the date.

comments.body: It will get postponed for sure. Kcet got postponed and they can't start without at least the first round of kcet counselling
